document_data.name: Ruathlek
document_data.mainbody: '''Ruathlek''' was the "secret language" or magical script of [[illusionist]]s. [[Waterdeep]] was known to hold at least one library of books in this dweomer-guarded tongue.
document_data.Description: It was known to include a silent sign language.{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-05-04 - Sign Languages in the Realms}}
document_data.History: Ruathlek was descended from the [[Netherese language]]. It was said that [[Leira]], the goddess of illusion and deception, developed Ruathlek with some of the descendants of [[Netheril]], the [[wizard]]s of [[Nimbral]]. Unlike most illusionists, the people of Nimbral used Ruathlek as both a magical script and their mundane, everyday language.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}
